question: A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter• give contact details for when you are away• give instructions about how to care for your pet• describe other household duties
text: I hope you and your family members are doing well during this pandemic situation.

As discussed with you over mobile, I will be on vacation from next week to end of this month and staying at The Mount Plaza in Australia. You know that I have a dog as a pet from my childhood and it is always part of my family. Due to travel restrictions from the aviation department, I cannot able to carry my pet to Australia.

I am leaving my pet to you, and I know you will take care of it very well. Regarding  the diet, I feed him meatballs and a cup of milk in the Morning and same diet additional to it, I will serve some chicken.

In addition, you know my lounge is enormous and I informed my maid to do the cleaning in the evening. She doesn’t have the main door key and insisted her  collect keys from you to do the cleaning activities. Once she left, kindly confirm that everything is sorted out and arranged properly.
